register.title: Register
register.desc: and get a membership on RichList.biz.

send.title: Send
send.desc: links to your best friends and invite them to join your list.

dashboard.subtitle: Your listline is active. Start building your network.

linkAnalytics.title: Referral Link Analytics
linkAnalytics.subtitle: Track how your referral link is performing
linkAnalytics.noClicks: No link clicks yet. Share your referral link to start tracking!

charts.positionTooltip: How often you appear at each position

successor.title: Successor Progress
successor.slotsAvailable: You have {{count}} successor slot(s) available. The system will automatically select from your last 3 depositing recruits.
successor.usedAllSlots: You've used all your successor nominations. Recruit more members to unlock additional slots!
successor.recruitMore: Recruit {{count}} more members with deposits to unlock the successor nomination feature.
successor.autoSelected: System has auto-selected {{name}} as your successor. Please confirm or decline this nomination.
successor.transferSuccess: The successor has been transferred successfully.

successorModal.title: Confirm Successor
successorModal.subtitle: Review and confirm nomination
successorModal.noLongerDownline: They will no longer be part of your direct downline

payments.title: Recent Payments
payments.noPaymentsDesc: You receive {{amount}} when someone in your network reaches Position 4 (3 levels deep)

listline.presenceSubtitle: See how many times you appear at each position across all listlines in the network.
listline.oneLevelAway: You're one level away from earning on {{count}} chains
listline.newestMember: You're the newest member in {{count}} chains
listline.ownListlineSubtitle: This is who received payment when you joined. Position 1 received {{amount}} from your membership.
listline.rule1: When you refer someone, they become Position 4 in their own listline
listline.rule4: Your referrer's referrer (3 levels up) becomes Position 1 and receives the payment
listline.rule5: The system collects {{percent}}% maintenance fee from every payment
listline.paymentFlows: Payment flows: P4 -> P3 -> P2 -> P1

successorSystem.title: Successor System
successorSystem.description: After recruiting {{count}} members who deposit, each additional recruit can be nominated as a "Successor" - gifted to your Position 1 ancestor.
successorSystem.withoutDesc: New recruit stays in your direct downline
successorSystem.withDesc: New recruit is moved to Position 1's downline as a reward

referrals.title: Your Direct Referrals
referrals.noReferralsDesc: Share your unique link to start building your network. You earn when your chain grows 3 levels deep!
referrals.networkSubtitle: Interactive 4-level tree visualization - click nodes for details

simulation.title: Live Simulation
simulation.subtitle: Watch your network grow in real-time

withdrawal.title: Withdraw Funds
withdrawal.subtitle: Transfer earnings to your account
withdrawal.sectionSubtitle: Transfer your cleared earnings to your bank account
withdrawal.coolingPeriod: 48-hour cooling period applies. Funds will be processed after verification.
withdrawal.notEligible: You don't meet all requirements for withdrawal yet.
